section.p: Age range for which a protocol is appropriate

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11539 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.149"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11282)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10723)/@code="67538-9" Protocol age category NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10724)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10725), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProtocolAgeCategory 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.86 DYNAMIC (CONF:10726)
NEMSIS Trace: EProtocols.02
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11282)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10723)/@code="67538-9" Protocol age category NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10724)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10725), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProtocolAgeCategory 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.86 DYNAMIC (CONF:10726)
NEMSIS Trace: EProtocols.02

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.149"/> <code code="67538-9" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Protocol age category NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation>
